skill.name: context-degradation
skill.description: This skill should be used when the user asks to "diagnose context problems", "fix lost-in-middle issues", "debug agent failures", "understand context poisoning", or mentions context degradation, attention patterns, context clash, context confusion, or agent performance degradation. Provides patterns for recognizing and mitigating context failures.

security_audit.summary: This skill contains educational content and diagnostic utilities for understanding AI context degradation. The Python script provides simulation-based analysis tools with no network access or system modifications. All functionality is transparent and educational.

content.value_statement: AI agents lose performance as conversations grow longer. This skill diagnoses lost-in-middle problems, context poisoning, and attention failures to restore optimal performance.
actual_capabilities: Detects when critical information is in attention-degraded positions
Identifies context poisoning from accumulated errors
Measures context utilization and health scores
Provides recovery recommendations for degraded contexts
limitations: Simulated attention analysis - not real model internals
No automatic fixing - only diagnostic information

use_cases.title: Debug Agent Performance Issues
use_cases.description: When your AI agent starts making mistakes in long conversations, use this to identify if context degradation is the cause.

use_cases.title: Optimize Context Placement
use_cases.description: Ensure critical information stays in attention-favored positions to maintain agent performance across long sessions.

use_cases.title: Study Context Failure Patterns
use_cases.description: Analyze how different context structures affect AI performance and develop better context management strategies.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Context Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Diagnose context problems in my agent session. The agent was working fine but now makes errors. Check for lost-in-middle issues and context poisoning.

prompt_templates.title: Long Conversation Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: My 50-turn conversation is experiencing context degradation. Analyze the attention distribution and identify which critical information might be lost.

prompt_templates.title: Context Structure Optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me structure this context to avoid degradation. Place critical elements in attention-favored positions and minimize distraction risks.

prompt_templates.title: Production Monitoring Setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Set up context health monitoring for my production agent. Define alert thresholds and recovery procedures for context degradation.

output_examples.input: Analyze why my coding agent fails after 30 turns
output: - Critical goals section in degraded attention region
- Move goals to beginning of context

best_practices: Monitor context length continuously - degradation starts around 8K-16K tokens for most models
Place critical information at beginning or end of context to avoid lost-in-middle effects
Implement compaction before reaching 80% of context limit to prevent sudden failures
anti_patterns: Never ignore gradual performance decline - it's often early context degradation
Don't assume larger context windows solve degradation - they just delay it
Avoid placing contradictory information in context without explicit resolution

faq.question: Which AI models does this work with?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, GPT, and Gemini models. Detection patterns are model-agnostic but thresholds vary by model capabilities.

faq.question: How often should I check for degradation?
faq.answer: Check every 10-15 turns or when performance drops. Set up automated monitoring for production systems.

faq.question: Can it fix degradation automatically?
faq.answer: No - it provides diagnostics and recommendations. You implement the fixes based on its analysis.

faq.question: Is my conversation data safe?
faq.answer: Yes - analysis runs locally with no external calls. Your context data never leaves your system.

faq.question: What if detection shows no issues but problems persist?
faq.answer: Check for other causes: tool errors, prompt issues, or model limitations. Context degradation is one of many failure modes.

faq.question: How is this different from context optimization?
faq.answer: This diagnoses problems; optimization prevents them. Use this when you already see degradation symptoms.
